entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
